dialogue.doctor: Where on your body do you notice this spot?
dialogue.patient: I noticed this spot on my forehead.

dialogue.doctor: Do you have other spots like this on your body?
dialogue.patient: Yes, I have a few other spots that look similar to this one. They are scattered across my body, but mostly on my arms and legs.

dialogue.doctor: Could you describe the shape and size of the spot?
dialogue.patient: The spot is irregular in shape, somewhat oval, and it's quite large compared to the surrounding skin.

dialogue.doctor: Is the edge of the spot well-defined or does it look irregular?
dialogue.patient: The edge of the spot looks irregular.

dialogue.doctor: Does the area have any redness or is it predominantly dark or pale?
dialogue.patient: The area is predominantly dark, with some redness around the edges of the growths.

dialogue.doctor: How does the texture of the area feel compared to the rest of your skin?
dialogue.patient: The texture of the area feels rougher and more uneven compared to the rest of my skin.

dialogue.doctor: Are there any symptoms associated with this area, such as itching or burning?
dialogue.patient: I have noticed some itching around this area, but no burning sensation.

dialogue.doctor: How often do you notice this spot?
dialogue.patient: I notice this spot quite often, especially when I'm outside in the sun.
